definition.dk: Vederlag, som en medarbejder modtager, når arbejdet er afsluttet.
definition.en-GB: Money, or other items of value such as pension contributions and health insurance, paid to employees as compensation for their work
definition.en-US: Money, or other items of value such as pension contributions and health insurance, paid to employees as compensation for their work
definition.se: Den ersättning en anställd får efter utfört arbete.

prefLabel.fr: Salaires et pensions ou Salaires et allocations
